languages.text: {n}Обычно бесстрастное лицо Ирлиэт искажено в гримасе боли и ярости. Ваш {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Толкователь{/g} оживает, когда она начинает говорить на своем языке.{/n} "Клянусь расколотым сердцем Кхейна, Муаран, ты ответишь за свое коварство! Пускай Мораи-Хег сломает твою судьбу и выбросит ее прочь, пусть кровь Эльданеша зальет твое горло..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Обычно бесстрастное лицо Ирлиэт искажено в гримасе боли и ярости. Ваш Толкователь оживает, когда она начинает говорить на своем языке.{/n} "Клянусь расколотым сердцем Кхейна, Муаран, ты ответишь за свое коварство! Испьешь чашу страданий до дна! Пройдешь дорогой мук и..."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet's usually dispassionate face is contorted in a grimace of pain and rage. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} activates when she begins speaking in her own language.{/n} "I swear on Khaine's riven heart, Muaran, you will pay for your treachery! May Morai-Heg sunder your fate and cast it away, may the blood of Eldanesh flood your throat—"
languages.original_text: {n}Обычно бесстрастное лицо Ирлиэт искажено в гримасе боли и ярости. Пускай Мораи-Хег сломает твою судьбу и выбросит ее прочь, пусть кровь Эльданеша зальет твое горло..."

You will drink of the cup of suffering to the very bottom! You will walk the path of torment and—"

languages.text: {n}普段なら私情を挟まないユリエットの顔つきが険しくなり、不快感と激昂をあらわにする。ユリエットが母語で話し始めると、{g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}エルシデイター{/g}が作動する。{/n}「我はカインの裂けた心臓に誓おう。ムアラン、背信行為の報いを受けよ！モライ=ヘグがお前の運命を断ち切り、エルダネシュの血がお前の喉から溢れんことを…」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's usually dispassionate face is contorted in a grimace of pain and rage. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} activates when she begins speaking in her own language.{/n} "I swear on Khaine's riven heart, Muaran, you will pay for your treachery! May Morai-Heg sunder your fate and cast it away, may the blood of Eldanesh flood your throat—"

traits.locale_text: {n}普段なら私情を挟まないユリエットの顔つきが険しくなり、不快感と激昂をあらわにする。ユリエットが母語で話し始めると、{g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}エルシデイター{/g}が作動する。{/n}「我はカインの裂けた心臓に誓おう。ムアラン、背信行為の報いを受けよ！モライ=ヘグがお前の運命を断ち切り、エルダネシュの血がお前の喉から溢れんことを…」

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特一贯冷漠的脸庞因痛苦与愤怒而扭曲。她以她自己的语言开了口时，你的{g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}阐释器{/g}启动了。{/n}“我以凯恩撕裂的心起誓，穆兰，你将为你的背叛付出代价！愿茉瑞·黑格摒弃你的命运！愿艾达奈什的鲜血流满你的喉咙——”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's usually dispassionate face is contorted in a grimace of pain and rage. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} activates when she begins speaking in her own language.{/n} "I swear on Khaine's riven heart, Muaran, you will pay for your treachery! May Morai-Heg sunder your fate and cast it away, may the blood of Eldanesh flood your throat—"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特一贯冷漠的脸庞因痛苦与愤怒而扭曲。她以她自己的语言开了口时，你的{g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}阐释器{/g}启动了。{/n}“我以凯恩撕裂的心起誓，穆兰，你将为你的背叛付出代价！你将饮干苦难之杯！你将走上苦痛的道途，而且——”

languages.text: {n}El rostro habitualmente impertérrito de Yrliet se contrae en una mueca de furia y dolor. Tu {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}dilucidador{/g} se activa cuando empieza a hablar en su lengua natal.{/n} «¡Muaran, te juro por el corazón hendido de Khaine que pagarás por tu perfidia! ¡Que Morai-Heg desgarre tu destino y los descarte, que la sangre de Eldanesh inunde tu gargan...!».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's usually dispassionate face is contorted in a grimace of pain and rage. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} activates when she begins speaking in her own language.{/n} "I swear on Khaine's riven heart, Muaran, you will pay for your treachery! May Morai-Heg sunder your fate and cast it away, may the blood of Eldanesh flood your throat—"

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro habitualmente impertérrito de Yrliet se contrae en una mueca de furia y dolor. Tu {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}dilucidador{/g} se activa cuando empieza a hablar en su lengua natal.{/n} «¡Muaran, te juro por el corazón hendido de Khaine que pagarás por tu perfidia! ¡Beberás del cáliz del sufrimiento hasta la última gota! ¡Caminarás por la senda del tormento y...!».

languages.text: {n}Yrliets üblicherweise emotionslose Miene ist zu einer Grimasse aus Schmerz und Wut verzerrt. Dein {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} aktiviert sich, als sie beginnt, in ihrer eigenen Sprache zu sprechen.{/n} "Ich schwöre bei Khaines gespaltenem Herzen, Muaran, Ihr werdet für Euren Verrat bezahlen! Möge Morai-Heg Euer Schicksal entzweien und verwerfen, möge Eldaneshs Blut Eure Kehle füllen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's usually dispassionate face is contorted in a grimace of pain and rage. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} activates when she begins speaking in her own language.{/n} "I swear on Khaine's riven heart, Muaran, you will pay for your treachery! May Morai-Heg sunder your fate and cast it away, may the blood of Eldanesh flood your throat—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliets üblicherweise emotionslose Miene ist zu einer Grimasse aus Schmerz und Wut verzerrt. Dein {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} aktiviert sich, als sie beginnt, in ihrer eigenen Sprache zu sprechen.{/n} "Ich schwöre bei Khaines gespaltenem Herzen, Muaran, Ihr werdet für Euren Verrat bezahlen! Ihr werdet den Becher der Qual bis zur letzten Neige austrinken! Ihr werdet den Pfad des Leids beschreiten und ..."

languages.text: {n}Une grimace de douleur et de colère déforme le visage habituellement impassible d'Yrliet. Votre {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}élucidateur{/g} s'active lorsqu'elle commence à parler dans sa propre langue.{/n} « Je le jure sur le cœur déchiré de Khaine, Muaran, vous allez payer pour cette trahison ! Vous boirez la coupe de la souffrance jusqu'à la lie ! Vous marcherez sur la voie du tourment et... »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's usually dispassionate face is contorted in a grimace of pain and rage. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} activates when she begins speaking in her own language.{/n} "I swear on Khaine's riven heart, Muaran, you will pay for your treachery! May Morai-Heg sunder your fate and cast it away, may the blood of Eldanesh flood your throat—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une grimace de douleur et de colère déforme le visage habituellement impassible d'Yrliet. Votre {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}élucidateur{/g} s'active lorsqu'elle commence à parler dans sa propre langue.{/n} « Je le jure sur le cœur déchiré de Khaine, Muaran, vous allez payer pour cette trahison ! Vous boirez la coupe de la souffrance jusqu’à la lie ! Vous marcherez sur la voie du tourment et... »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in genelde duygudan yoksun çehresi, acı ve öfkeyle buruşuyor. Kendi dilinde konuşmaya başlamasıyla {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Aydınlatıcın{/g} da etkinleşiyor.{/n} "Khaine'in yarık kalbine ant olsun ki ihanetinin bedelini ödeyeceksin Muaran! Morai-Heg, kaderini parçalayıp atsın! Eldanesh'in kanı boğazını tıkasın!"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's usually dispassionate face is contorted in a grimace of pain and rage. Your {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Elucidator{/g} activates when she begins speaking in her own language.{/n} "I swear on Khaine's riven heart, Muaran, you will pay for your treachery! May Morai-Heg sunder your fate and cast it away, may the blood of Eldanesh flood your throat—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in genelde soğukkanlı çehresi, acı ve öfkeyle buruşuyor. Kendi dilinde konuşmaya başladığında {g|Encyclopedia:Elucidator}Aydınlatıcı{/g} çalışıyor.{/n} "Khaine'in yarık kalbine ant olsun ki ihanetinin bedelini ödeyeceksin Muaran! Ciğerlerini kurutup kan kusturacağım sana! Azap yolunda yürütüp..."
